noInternet: No internet connection. Check your network and try again.
sessionExpired: Your session needs a refresh. Please sign out and back in.
tryAgain: Please check your connection and try again.
retryError: The app ran into an unexpected error.\nPlease try reloading.
fatalError: The app keeps crashing.\nPlease close and reopen it.

camera.accessNeededMsg: Allow camera access so you can snap a photo.
camera.photoAccessNeededMsg: Allow photo access so you can pick from your library.
camera.errorCamera: Something went wrong with the camera.
camera.errorLibrary: Something went wrong picking the photo.
camera.addPhotoMsg: How would you like to add your photo?

restartMessage: Please close and reopen the app to apply the language change.
deleteAccountMsg: This will permanently delete your account and all your data (recipes, pantry, shopping lists). This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
